87#define NCPP_RCLASS(ClassName) \
88 private:\
89 using current_rclass = ClassName;\
90 public:\
91 virtual ncpp::rtti::rclass_t<ncpp::rtti::robject_i> get_rclass(){\
92 \
93 return ncpp::rtti::rclass_t<ClassName>();\
94 }\
95 static inline ncpp::rtti::rclass_t<ClassName> get_static_rclass() {\
96 \
97 return ncpp::rtti::rclass_t<ClassName>(); \
98 }
99
100#define NCPP_RCSCOPE(ClassName) \
101 ncpp::rtti::robject_constructor_scope __robject_constructor_scope__(*this);
102
103#define NCPP_RCVARIABLE(MemberType, MemberName, ...) \
104 MemberType MemberName;\
105 char MemberName##_name_cstr[sizeof(#MemberName)] = #MemberName;\
106 using MemberName##_args_type = typename ncpp::rtti::robject_member_args_t<__VA_ARGS__>;\
107 MemberName##_args_type MemberName##_args = {__VA_ARGS__}; \
108 using MemberName##_reflecter_type = ncpp::rtti::robject_variable_reflecter_t<\
109 current_rclass, \
110 MemberType, \
111 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName##_name_cstr),\
112 &current_rclass::MemberName##_name_cstr,\
113 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName##_args),\
114 &current_rclass::MemberName##_args,\
115 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName),\
116 &current_rclass::MemberName\
117 >; \
118 friend class MemberName##_reflecter_type; \
119 MemberName##_reflecter_type MemberName##_reflecter;
120
121#define NCPP_RCFUNCTION(MemberFunctionType, MemberName,...) \
122 using MemberName##_type = MemberFunctionType; \
123 MemberName##_type MemberName; \
124 char MemberName##_name_cstr[sizeof(#MemberName)] = #MemberName;\
125 typename ncpp::rtti::robject_member_args_t<__VA_ARGS__> MemberName##_args = {__VA_ARGS__}; \
126 using MemberName##_reflecter_type = ncpp::rtti::robject_function_reflecter_t<\
127 current_rclass, \
128 MemberFunctionType, \
129 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName##_name_cstr),\
130 &current_rclass::MemberName##_name_cstr,\
131 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName##_args),\
132 &current_rclass::MemberName##_args,\
133 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName), \
134 &current_rclass::MemberName \
135 >; \
136 friend class MemberName##_reflecter_type; \
137 MemberName##_reflecter_type MemberName##_reflecter;

219 struct robject_member_handle;
220 struct robject_member_handle;
221
222
223
224 struct robject_member_handle {
225
226 struct args_array_type {
227
228 sz* head_arg_p = 0;
229 sz arg_count = 0;
230
231 inline const sz& head() const {
232
233 return *head_arg_p;
234 }
235 inline const sz& tail() const {
236
237 return *(head_arg_p + arg_count - 1);
238 }
239 inline const sz* begin() const {
240
241 return head_arg_p;
242 }
243 inline const sz* end() const {
244
245 return head_arg_p + arg_count;
246 }
247
248 };
249
250
251
252 args_array_type args_array;
253 robject_i* robject_p = 0;
254 void* member_ptr_p = 0;
255
256
257
258 inline robject_member_handle() {
259
260
261 }
262 inline robject_member_handle(const robject_member_handle& other) :
263 args_array(other.args_array),
264 robject_p(other.robject_p),
265 member_ptr_p(other.member_ptr_p)
266 {
267
268
269
270 }
271 inline robject_member_handle& operator = (const robject_member_handle& other) {
272
273 args_array = other.args_array;
274 robject_p = other.robject_p;
275 member_ptr_p = other.member_ptr_p;
276
277 return *this;
278 }
279

281
282 template<typename type__>
283 using recorrected_type_t = typename utilities::nth_template_arg_t<
284 utilities::is_function_t<type__>::value,
285 type__,
286 typename std::function<type__>
287 >::type;
288
289
290
291 template<typename type__>
292 inline recorrected_type_t<type__>& to_t() {
293
294 return *reinterpret_cast<recorrected_type_t<type__>*>(member_ptr_p);
295 }
296
297 template<typename type__>
298 inline recorrected_type_t<const type__>& to_t() const {
299
300 return *reinterpret_cast<recorrected_type_t<const type__>*>(member_ptr_p);
301 }
302
303
304
305 template<typename type__>
306 inline robject_member_handle& operator = (type__&& other) {
307
308 *((std::remove_reference<type__>::type*)member_ptr_p) = std::forward<type__>(other);
309
310 return *this;
311 }
312
313 };

431 class robject_i {
432
433 NCPP_RCLASS(robject_i);
434
438
439 public:
440 using name_to_member_handle_map_type = typename containers::native_unordered_map_t<containers::native_string, robject_member_handle>;
441
445
446 private:
447 name_to_member_handle_map_type name_to_member_handle_map_;
448 robject_constructor_scope constructor_scope_;
449
450 public:
451 NCPP_RCVARIABLE(
452 containers::native_string, name
453 );
454
458
459#pragma region Constructors, Destructor and Operators
460 public:
461 robject_i();
462 virtual ~robject_i();
463
464 inline robject_member_handle& operator [] (const containers::native_string& member_name) {
465
466 if (name_to_member_handle_map_.find(member_name) != name_to_member_handle_map_.end())
467 return name_to_member_handle_map_.find(member_name)->second;
468
469 return *utilities::lref_t<robject_member_handle>();
470 }
471 inline const robject_member_handle& operator [] (const containers::native_string& member_name) const {
472
473 if (name_to_member_handle_map_.find(member_name) != name_to_member_handle_map_.end())
474 return name_to_member_handle_map_.find(member_name)->second;
475
476 return *utilities::lref_t<const robject_member_handle>();
477 }
478#pragma endregion
479
483
484#pragma region Methods
485 public:
486 inline b8 is_has_member(const containers::native_string& member_name) {
487
488 if (name_to_member_handle_map_.find(member_name) != name_to_member_handle_map_.end())
489 return true;
490
491 return false;
492 }
493
494 inline void add_member_handle(const containers::native_string& member_name, const robject_member_handle& handle) {
495
496 assert(!is_has_member(member_name) && "member already existed");
497
498 name_to_member_handle_map_[member_name] = handle;
499
500 }
501
502 template<typename variable_type__>
503 inline variable_type__& var_t(const containers::native_string& var_name) {
504
505 return var_handle(var_name).get_t<variable_type__>();
506 }
507
508 template<typename function_type__>
509 inline std::function<function_type__>& func_t(const containers::native_string& func_name) {
510
511 return func_handle(func_name).get_t<function_type__>();
512 }
513#pragma endregion
514
515 };

534 template<
535 class object_type__,
536 typename variable_type__,
537 typename name_member_ptr_type,
538 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
539 typename args_member_ptr_type,
540 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
541 typename member_ptr_type,
542 member_ptr_type member_ptr
543 >
544 robject_variable_reflecter_t<
545 object_type__,
546 variable_type__,
547 name_member_ptr_type,
548 name_member_ptr,
549 args_member_ptr_type,
550 args_member_ptr,
551 member_ptr_type,
552 member_ptr
553 >::robject_variable_reflecter_t() {
554
555 object_type__& robj = (object_type__&)current_constructing_object();
556
557 robject_member_handle rvar_handle;
558 rvar_handle.args_array = {
559 (robj.*args_member_ptr).data(),
560 (robj.*args_member_ptr).size()
561 };
562 rvar_handle.robject_p = &robj;
563 rvar_handle.member_ptr_p = &(robj.*member_ptr);
564
565 robj.add_member_handle(robj.*name_member_ptr, rvar_handle);
566
567 }
568

570 class object_type__,
571 typename variable_type__,
572 typename name_member_ptr_type,
573 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
574 typename args_member_ptr_type,
575 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
576 typename member_ptr_type,
577 member_ptr_type member_ptr
578 >
579 robject_variable_reflecter_t<
580 object_type__,
581 variable_type__,
582 name_member_ptr_type,
583 name_member_ptr,
584 args_member_ptr_type,
585 args_member_ptr,
586 member_ptr_type,
587 member_ptr
588 >::~robject_variable_reflecter_t() {
589
590
591
592 }

610 template<
611 class object_type__,
612 typename function_type__,
613 typename name_member_ptr_type,
614 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
615 typename args_member_ptr_type,
616 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
617 typename member_ptr_type,
618 member_ptr_type member_ptr
619 >
620 robject_function_reflecter_t<
621 object_type__,
622 function_type__,
623 name_member_ptr_type,
624 name_member_ptr,
625 args_member_ptr_type,
626 args_member_ptr,
627 member_ptr_type,
628 member_ptr
629 >::robject_function_reflecter_t(){
630
631 object_type__& robj = (object_type__&)current_constructing_object();
632
633 using function_traits = typename utilities::function_traits_t<function_type__>;
634
635 using executer_getter_type = typename robject_function_reflecter_executer_get_t<
636 object_type__,
637 function_type__,
638 std::is_same_v<function_traits::result_type, void>,
639 name_member_ptr_type,
640 name_member_ptr,
641 args_member_ptr_type,
642 args_member_ptr,
643 member_ptr_type,
644 member_ptr
645 >;
646
647 executer_type rfunc_executer = executer_getter_type::get(robj);
648
649 robject_member_handle rfunc_handle;
650 rfunc_handle.args_array = {
651 (robj.*args_member_ptr).data(),
652 (robj.*args_member_ptr).size()
653 };
654 rfunc_handle.robject_p = &robj;
655 rfunc_handle.member_ptr_p = reinterpret_cast<void*>(rfunc_executer);
656
657 robj.add_member_handle(robj.*name_member_ptr, rfunc_handle);
658
659 }
660

662 class object_type__,
663 typename function_type__,
664 typename name_member_ptr_type,
665 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
666 typename args_member_ptr_type,
667 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
668 typename member_ptr_type,
669 member_ptr_type member_ptr
670 >
671 robject_function_reflecter_t<
672 object_type__,
673 function_type__,
674 name_member_ptr_type,
675 name_member_ptr,
676 args_member_ptr_type,
677 args_member_ptr,
678 member_ptr_type,
679 member_ptr
680 >::~robject_function_reflecter_t() {
681
682
683
684 }

686 template<
687 class object_type__,
688 typename function_type__,
689 typename name_member_ptr_type,
690 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
691 typename args_member_ptr_type,
692 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
693 typename member_ptr_type,
694 member_ptr_type member_ptr
695 >
696 struct robject_function_reflecter_executer_get_t <
697 object_type__,
698 function_type__,
699 true,
700 name_member_ptr_type,
701 name_member_ptr,
702 args_member_ptr_type,
703 args_member_ptr,
704 member_ptr_type,
705 member_ptr
706 >
707 {
708
709 using executer_type = typename robject_function_reflecter_t<
710 object_type__,
711 function_type__,
712 name_member_ptr_type,
713 name_member_ptr,
714 args_member_ptr_type,
715 args_member_ptr,
716 member_ptr_type,
717 member_ptr
718 >::executer_type;
719
720 using function_traits = typename utilities::function_traits_t<function_type__>;
721
722 static inline executer_type get(object_type__& robj) {
723
724 static std::function<function_type__> func_s = [&robj](auto&&... args) -> function_traits::result_type {
725
726 (robj.*member_ptr)(std::forward<decltype(args)>(args)...);
727
728 };
729
730 return &func_s;
731 }
732
733 };
734
735 template<
736 class object_type__,
737 typename function_type__,
738 typename name_member_ptr_type,
739 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
740 typename args_member_ptr_type,
741 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
742 typename member_ptr_type,
743 member_ptr_type member_ptr
744 >
745 struct robject_function_reflecter_executer_get_t <
746 object_type__,
747 function_type__,
748 false,
749 name_member_ptr_type,
750 name_member_ptr,
751 args_member_ptr_type,
752 args_member_ptr,
753 member_ptr_type,
754 member_ptr
755 >
756 {
757
758 using executer_type = typename robject_function_reflecter_t<
759 object_type__,
760 function_type__,
761 name_member_ptr_type,
762 name_member_ptr,
763 args_member_ptr_type,
764 args_member_ptr,
765 member_ptr_type,
766 member_ptr
767 >::executer_type;
768
769 using function_traits = typename utilities::function_traits_t<function_type__>;
770
771 static inline executer_type get(object_type__& robj) {
772
773 static std::function<function_type__> func_s = [&robj](auto&&... args) -> function_traits::result_type {
774
775 return (robj.*member_ptr)(std::forward<decltype(args)>(args)...);
776
777 };
778
779 return &func_s;
780 }
781
782 };
